responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "03466BA9436A69C517C5B8A7BE03FC33", "I\'ll soon make some crutches out of those healing branches. I\'ll get Old Man Rodric to help out with some spellin\' - he\'s been practicing cleric blessin\'s since he came across the portal! Gods bless \'im, he\'s one of the best doctors we have. With the donation of those healing branches, the kids in the outlaw camps won\'t be sufferin\' from the twisterbones no more!")
name: SQ_Lionhold_0002_Fragments_Jimson_3_Response
